Acute Care

description: A diversified national managed health care company based in Bethesda, Maryland, dedicated to delivering high-quality health care solutions at an affordable price. Craig D. Fox is a solo Family Practitioner  located in Washington Pennsylvania. Our office believes that family medicine is a specialty dedicated to providing continuing and comprehensive health care with the patient in the center participating in their decision making. Our physician combines unique abilities including attitude, communications and technical skills, health maintenance,health promotion,counseling,education, preventative care and rehabilitation services. Dr Fox has utilized computer services for years having a full EMR, RX prescribing, and an active  patient portal.  This encourages patients to make their own appointments, review their test results ,email messages  and encouragement of decision making. Through these beliefs our office has participated in meaningful use since it's inception in 2011. We are actively working on MU2 second stage. Believing in quality care measurements and patient safety technical support is now essential for both the patient's, physician  and staff. Supporting the role that patient's should actively contribute to their health care decisions this office then structured to partnership with our physician, staff, patients,families and community to ensure that decisions are made respecting the patients' wants, needs, preferences, socioeconomic background and education.  With theses goals in mind we then actively engaged in the NCQA Patient Centered Medical Home process and achieved level 3 thoroughly incorporating all aspects into our daily care. Our efforts are to continually look at how we practice and to always strive to improve quality comprehensive care with emphasis on our patient 's health ,technical support, efficiency, cost effectiveness,  and ongoing medical expertise.

description: Our mission is to improve health and well-being in partnership with our members, patients and community.

As our community’s public health system, Parkland is the foundation for a healthy Dallas.

That’s why we ask ourselves every day, how can we better serve our patients?

We work to make sure that we are focused on our patients, that we find problems, correct them and that we are always looking for new ways to improve.

As Parkland adds more services into the neighborhoods that need us most, we know that how we treat each and every patient affects the health and well-being of our entire community.

Patient care is more than our job. It is our passion.

Many of these services are provided through partnerships, affiliations and relationships developed with other exceptional providers. Overall, Saint Francis Care provides access to almost 900 affiliated physicians, three hospital campuses, 12 satellite medical offices, and a variety of community clinics. \nBest Care for a Lifetime is the vision Saint Francis Care embraces as we partner with our patients, their families and our community to provide health and healing through a commitment to clinical excellence, quality and safety, compassionate care, and reverence for the spirituality of each person. description:
The MetroHealth System is one of the largest, most comprehensive health care providers in Northeast Ohio, serving the medical needs of the Greater Cleveland community since 1837.

We are committed to responding to community needs, improving the health status of our region, and controlling health care costs. As a public healthcare system, we hold as a core value the provision of services to any resident of Cuyahoga County, regardless of ability to pay.

More than 400 primary care and specialty care physicians practice within The MetroHealth System.  Every year, MetroHealth Medical Center provides care to more than 28,000 inpatients and delivers about 2,900 newborns. Nearly 900,000 visits are recorded each year in the medical center's outpatient centers, and patient visits to the emergency department exceed 104,000.

Affiliated with Case Western Reserve University School of Medicine since 1914, MetroHealth is a center for medical research and education, with all active staff physicians holding CWRU faculty appointments. Learn more about research and education.

For more than half a century, UCLA Health has provided the best in healthcare and the latest in medical technology to the people of Los Angeles and throughout the world.

Comprised of Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, UCLA Medical Center, Santa Monica, Resnick Neuropsychiatric Hospital at UCLA, Mattel Children's Hospital UCLA, and the UCLA Medical Group with its wide-reaching system of primary-care and specialty-care offices throughout the region, UCLA Health is among the most comprehensive and advanced healthcare systems in the world.

Our physicians are world leaders in the diagnosis and treatment of complex illnesses, and our hospitals are among the best in the country. Consistently ranked one of the top three hospitals in the nation and the best in the western United States by U.S. News & World Report, UCLA Health is at the cutting edge of biomedical research, and our doctors and scientists are leaders in performing pioneering work across an astounding range of disciplines, from organ transplantation and cardiac surgery to neurosurgery and cancer treatment, and bringing the latest discoveries to virtually every field of medicine.

description:
Virtual Care Works (VCW) is a United States Corporation, registered in Colorado.  VCW conducts business in the Health and Life Science business verticals of the U.S. Health industry.  VCW is a medical grade electronic health data transfer company.  VCW differentiates itself from other Telehealth companies by securing allocated bandwidth on which clients send personal health information (electronic health records) using the VCW private Internet and not the public Internet used by other companies. The combination of HIPAA security and private bandwidth allows for extremely high quality of service that is virtually un-penetrable from criminal hackers. 
	VCW offers a focused suite of products for HIPAA secure medical data transfers:
•	Secure Network infrastructure - Dell, Juniper, Level 3, Microsoft, Apple
•	Video Communications/Conferencing - Vidyo
•	Secure Email within the network 
•	Secure Texting (ios, android, smartphone, tablet, iPad, desktop, hard-wire, wireless, (Wi-Fi) 
•	Large File Transfer Protocols for movement of electronic patient record2.
